review_en: Item won't fit in my sink
review_cn: 商品无法放入我的水槽

tags.evidence: Item won't fit in my sink

review_en: The width dimension on 9” doesn't take into account the thumb screws that add another half inch making it just a hair too wide to fit
review_cn: 9英寸的宽度尺寸没有考虑到拇指螺丝增加了半英寸，导致刚好稍微宽了一点，无法安装

tags.evidence: just a hair too wide to fit

review_en: Not as Expected|Strong chemical smell from plastic nuts. Did not like the adjustment process having to loosen and tighten nuts. |Not sure
review_cn: 不符合预期|塑料螺母有强烈的化学气味。不喜欢需要松开和拧紧螺母的调整过程。|不确定

tags.evidence: Strong chemical smell from plastic nuts
